location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 3308/46 'Telegram from Political Agent Muscat to Ministry of Economic Warfare (Dry Lemons)'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 16; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of telegrams between the Political Agent, Muscat, to the Secretary of State, India, regarding orders and transport arrangements for dry lemons.
